Package mediator

Interface RemoteModel

All Superinterfaces:
utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<Object,Object>, Remote, utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<Object,Object>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface RemoteModel extends utility.observer.subject.RemoteSubject<Object,Object>
An interface intended to be implemented by model classes that want to expose themselves as remote objects. This should be the same on client and server. If you make updates to one, make sure to update the other one as well.
Version:
1.4.0 - May 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan, Supendra Bogati, Lucia Andronic
